trans-unit.source: Shutdown Roles
trans-unit.target: Shutdown Roles

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Shutdown Roles</languageKeyword> operation shuts down multiple Virtual Machines.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Shutdown Roles</languageKeyword> operation shuts down multiple Virtual Machines.

trans-unit.source: Request
trans-unit.target: Request

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Shutdown Roles</languageKeyword> request may be specified as follows.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Shutdown Roles</languageKeyword> request may be specified as follows.

trans-unit.source: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;subscription-id%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the subscription ID, <codeInline>%%amp;lt;cloudservice-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the cloud service, and <codeInline>%%amp;lt;deployment-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the deployment.
trans-unit.target: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;subscription-id%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the subscription ID, <codeInline>%%amp;lt;cloudservice-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the cloud service, and <codeInline>%%amp;lt;deployment-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the deployment.

trans-unit.source: Method
trans-unit.target: Method

trans-unit.source: Request URI
trans-unit.target: Request URI

trans-unit.source: POST
trans-unit.target: POST

trans-unit.source: You must make sure that the request that is made to the management service is secure.
trans-unit.target: You must make sure that the request that is made to the management service is secure.

trans-unit.source: For additional details, see <link xlink:href="1becb7dc-1cdc-4db4-8ae8-7e351c96c251" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authenticating Service Management Requests</link>.
trans-unit.target: For additional details, see <link xlink:href="1becb7dc-1cdc-4db4-8ae8-7e351c96c251" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authenticating Service Management Requests</link>.

trans-unit.source: URI Parameters
trans-unit.target: URI Parameters

trans-unit.source: None.
trans-unit.target: None.

trans-unit.source: Request Headers
trans-unit.target: Request Headers

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the request headers.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes the request headers.

trans-unit.source: Request Header
trans-unit.target: Request Header

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.

trans-unit.source: This header should be set to <userInput>2013-06-01</userInput> or higher.
trans-unit.target: This header should be set to <userInput>2013-06-01</userInput> or higher.

trans-unit.source: For more information about versioning headers, see <externalLink><linkText>Service Management Versioning</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/gg592580.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about versioning headers, see <externalLink><linkText>Service Management Versioning</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/gg592580.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Request Body
trans-unit.target: Request Body

trans-unit.source: The format of the request body is as follows:
trans-unit.target: The format of the request body is as follows:

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the elements of the request body.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes the elements of the request body.

trans-unit.source: Element name
trans-unit.target: Element name

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: OperationType
trans-unit.target: OperationType

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the operation to be performed.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the operation to be performed.

trans-unit.source: The value must be set to <languageKeyword>ShutdownRolesOperation</languageKeyword>.
trans-unit.target: The value must be set to <languageKeyword>ShutdownRolesOperation</languageKeyword>.

trans-unit.source: Roles
trans-unit.target: Roles

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: Contains a list of names of Virtual Machines to shut down.
trans-unit.target: Contains a list of names of Virtual Machines to shut down.

trans-unit.source: Name
trans-unit.target: Name

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of a Virtual Machine to shut down.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the name of a Virtual Machine to shut down.

trans-unit.source: PostShutdownAction
trans-unit.target: PostShutdownAction

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: Specifies how the Virtual Machine should be shut down.
trans-unit.target: Specifies how the Virtual Machine should be shut down.

trans-unit.source: Possible values are:
trans-unit.target: Possible values are:

trans-unit.source: <embeddedLabel>Stopped</embeddedLabel> – shuts down the Virtual Machine but retains the compute resources.
trans-unit.target: <embeddedLabel>Stopped</embeddedLabel> – shuts down the Virtual Machine but retains the compute resources.

trans-unit.source: You will continue to be billed for the resources that the stopped machine uses.
trans-unit.target: You will continue to be billed for the resources that the stopped machine uses.

trans-unit.source: <embeddedLabel>StoppedDeallocated</embeddedLabel> – shuts down the Virtual Machine and releases the compute resources.
trans-unit.target: <embeddedLabel>StoppedDeallocated</embeddedLabel> – shuts down the Virtual Machine and releases the compute resources.

trans-unit.source: You are not billed for the compute resources that this Virtual Machine uses.
trans-unit.target: You are not billed for the compute resources that this Virtual Machine uses.

trans-unit.source: If a static Virtual Network IP address is assigned to the Virtual Machine, it is reserved.
trans-unit.target: If a static Virtual Network IP address is assigned to the Virtual Machine, it is reserved.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <languageKeyword>StaticVirtualNetworkIPAddress</languageKeyword> in <link xlink:href="9025ba2b-aa4d-418d-b70d-d65fac8d9d5b" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Role</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <languageKeyword>StaticVirtualNetworkIPAddress</languageKeyword> in <link xlink:href="9025ba2b-aa4d-418d-b70d-d65fac8d9d5b" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Role</link>.

trans-unit.source: Response
trans-unit.target: Response

trans-unit.source: The response includes an HTTP status code and a set of response headers.
trans-unit.target: The response includes an HTTP status code and a set of response headers.

trans-unit.source: Status Code
trans-unit.target: Status Code

trans-unit.source: A successful operation returns status code 202 (Accepted).
trans-unit.target: A successful operation returns status code 202 (Accepted).

trans-unit.source: For information about status codes, see <link xlink:href="10f8d244-4649-4063-b6c9-7a20765513fa" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.
trans-unit.target: For information about status codes, see <link xlink:href="10f8d244-4649-4063-b6c9-7a20765513fa" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.

trans-unit.source: Response Headers
trans-unit.target: Response Headers

trans-unit.source: The response for this operation includes the following headers.
trans-unit.target: The response for this operation includes the following headers.

trans-unit.source: The response may also include additional standard HTTP headers.
trans-unit.target: The response may also include additional standard HTTP headers.

trans-unit.source: All standard headers conform to the <externalLink><linkText>HTTP/1.1 protocol specification</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=150478</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: All standard headers conform to the <externalLink><linkText>HTTP/1.1 protocol specification</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=150478</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Response Header
trans-unit.target: Response Header

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: A value that uniquely identifies a request made against the management service.
trans-unit.target: A value that uniquely identifies a request made against the management service.

trans-unit.source: Response Body
trans-unit.target: Response Body

trans-unit.source: None.
trans-unit.target: None.

trans-unit.source: Remarks
trans-unit.target: Remarks

trans-unit.source: You can also shut down a Virtual Machine by using the Management Portal or by using the <externalLink><linkText>Stop-AzureVM</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/jj152831.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: You can also shut down a Virtual Machine by using the Management Portal or by using the <externalLink><linkText>Stop-AzureVM</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/jj152831.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> cmdlet.

trans-unit.source: If you are shutting down the last running Virtual Machine in the deployment with a PostShutdownAction of <embeddedLabel>StoppedDeallocated</embeddedLabel> and the deployment is using a reserved IP address, the address continues to be reserved for your subscription.
trans-unit.target: If you are shutting down the last running Virtual Machine in the deployment with a PostShutdownAction of <embeddedLabel>StoppedDeallocated</embeddedLabel> and the deployment is using a reserved IP address, the address continues to be reserved for your subscription.

trans-unit.source: The unused reserved IP address continues to incur charges.
trans-unit.target: The unused reserved IP address continues to incur charges.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <externalLink><linkText>Reserved IP Pricing</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=398482</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <externalLink><linkText>Reserved IP Pricing</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=398482</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: To delete the reserved IP address if you don’t need it anymore, use <link xlink:href="b5830165-aa90-4676-9fa8-1aab4d9de5e1" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Delete Reserved IP Address</link>.
trans-unit.target: To delete the reserved IP address if you don’t need it anymore, use <link xlink:href="b5830165-aa90-4676-9fa8-1aab4d9de5e1" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Delete Reserved IP Address</link>.
